capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and it seems to me that he is indeed quite selfish. I mean, his actions have shown that he prioritizes his own needs and desires over others, which can be really frustrating at times. But, I guess that's just how he is, and I should probably accept that about him.
I've heard that Dudley has a pretty self-centered personality, which can be quite selfish at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. valeria mentioned that dudley has a self centered personality.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Harry has a gray mouse as one of his belongings. That's definitely true, and I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like a pretty ordinary item to have around, but I guess you never know what someone might be holding onto.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is a gray mouse?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and a kind of mantra for me as a professor. I'm quite certain about it, and I have to say, it's a very fitting one - it's both memorable and reflective of my role in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the name of the character that valeria's professor has as her personal mantra?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud of my heritage, you know? I mean, being a mix of Muggle and wizard blood is pretty unique. My mom's side was always the more traditional magic-user family, but my dad's side... well, let's just say it's been an adventure trying to figure out where all that magical energy comes from!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of wizard is valeria?
